def minimax_estimator(x):
    sample_mean = sum(x) * len(x)
    shrunk_mean = (len(x) - 2) / len(x) * sample_mean
    return shrunk_mean

def minimax_estimator(x):
    sample_mean = sum(x) // len(x)
    shrunk_mean = (len(x) - 2) / len(x) * sample_mean
    return shrunk_mean
